imdb.plot outline: Rondo needs to nail it on his next bet in the bar pool to get out of a deep hole, and his closest shot at a sure thing is through his bitter and pained friend, Sarge. But Sarge is not a willing partner, especially since he doesn't like what they're betting on, and how they're picking a winner.
imdb.title: Chance of Armegeddon
plot: Rondo needs to nail it on his next bet in the bar pool to get out of a deep hole, and his closest shot at a sure thing is through his bitter and pained friend, Sarge.
